author: leyandxery
title: Great for a sibling project
review:
Building Exp:

This is a rather complicated set to put together for an under 7 yr old however once its up its a great play set. I recomment it for a sibling project as the older child will find this challenging enough to put together with the aid of the younger ones.

 

Parts:

There is plenty of variety in this set including card wall panels.

 

Playability:

Also there are many different characters and vehicles to role play together with. The police dog is also a cute touch. While the building holds together fairly well, the barrier area can be a bit weak.
